00001 package se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.modelConversion.simulink.preprocessing;
00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.Collection;
00005 
00006 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList;
00007 
00008 
00009 import Simulink.Port;
00010 import Simulink.ProtoObject;
00011 import Simulink.System;
00012 
00013 public abstract class PortProcessor {
00014 
00015         ArrayList<ProtoObject> list = new ArrayList<ProtoObject>();
00016         System theSystem;
00017         SystemLayouter layouter;
00018 
00019         protected void init(System aSystem, SystemLayouter layouter) {
00020                 this.theSystem = aSystem;
00021                 this.layouter = layouter;
00022         }
00023 
00024         protected <P extends Port> Collection<? extends ProtoObject> process(EList<P> ports) {
00025                 for (P port : ports ) {
00026                         processPort( port );
00027                         list.add( port );
00028                 }
00029                 return list;
00030         }
00031 
00032         protected <P extends Port> void processPort(P port) {
00033                 computeInstanceName( port );
00034                 computePosition( port );
00035         }
00036 
00037         protected void computePosition(Port port) {
00038                 String position = port.getPosition(); 
00039                 if ( (position==null) || (position.isEmpty()) ) {
00040                         position = layouter.nextPort();
00041                         port.setPosition(position);
00042                 }
00043         }
00044         
00045         protected <P extends Port> void computeInstanceName(Port port) {
00046                 String parentName = this.getParentName( port );
00047                 this.addTypeSuffixIfNeeded( port );
00048                 String simuName = parentName + '/' + port.getName();
00049                 port.setSimulinkName(simuName); 
00050 }
00051 
00052         protected abstract void addTypeSuffixIfNeeded(Port port);
00053         
00054         protected String getParentName(Port port) {
00055                 return "subClass responsibility";
00056         }
00057 }
